## Introduction 

This interactive shiny app allows empirical bayesian analysis using beta distributions based on summary data from published trials with binary outcomes. 

Data derived prior is based on the sum of the two groups


It is still a work in progress. Please get in touch with any comments or requests through  [@load_dependent](twitter.com/load_dependent) or <lars.molgaard.saxhaug@ntnu.no>
